12164: The text does not explicitly state that the Mark is divided into sections. However, it is divided into several chapters and sections, which are numbered and titled.
23148: The Vingtieme, a small restaurant in Greek Street, near Soho Square, London.
25278: Crito persuades Socrates to escape with his words, but Socrates is not entirely convinced and ultimately decides not to escape.
33068: Lieutenant Shane Wolfe is assigned to rescue the Plummer children, Julie, Zoe, Todd, Lulu, and Peter, from the clutches of the Serbian warlord, Serb 2, and his men.
38322: The men know the spaceship has ended its voyage because it has stopped moving, as indicated by the text: "Then it reversed direction, and the servos led it triumphantly back toward the landing port of the Station."
42586: The Inca was disguised as Captain Duval.
16886: The Gyro Captain is killed when he is hit by an arrow shot by the Feral Kid, who is lashed to the front of the Humungus machine.
